Articles.Content:
i am new to blender so no nothing about it 

my idea:

i moveable launchpad for the space plane hanger

part

[glow=red,2,300]slow cart[/glow]

[glow=red,2,300]radial holders[/glow]

[glow=red,2,300]movable launch arm[/glow]

[glow=red,2,300]legs to hold it in place[/glow]

red=not started or modaling

orange=texturing

blue=cfg editing

green=done

Try to look at some videos. google is your friend.

I could do some beta testing, maybe some texturing, just ask me and ill see what i can do.

> 
> Try to look at some videos. google is your friend.
> 
> I could do some beta testing, maybe some texturing, just ask me and ill see what i can do.

can you help with modaling?

> 
> can you help with modaling?

I could try, but no promises.

ive decited to instead of the launch tower holding the rocket the pad will have 'hooks' that hold the bottom of the rocket

and the cart may have a hole in the middel for the exsaust of the rocket

ps need somebody good with modaling to help(will thank very much)

> 
> ive decited to instead of the launch tower holding the rocket the pad will have 'hooks' that hold the bottom of the rocket
> 
> and the cart may have a hole in the middel for the exsaust of the rocket
> 
> ps need somebody good with modaling to help(will thank very much)

You should try it yourself, it will be more rewarding in the long run. If you post pictures, though, we will give you feedback. I most likely will, as I have some experience in blender.
how do you add lines to a object?

> 
> how do you add lines to a object?

There are plenty of tutorials that can help you with that, and more. You will be better off to watch a few tutorials, and trying things yourself.
